document_notes.text:
This update for rmt-server fixes the following issues:

Updated to version 2.13:
- CVE-2023-28120: Fixed a potential XSS issue in an embedded
  dependency (bsc#1209507).
- CVE-2023-27530: Fixed a denial of service issue in multipart request
  parsing (bsc#1209096).

Non-security fixes:
- Fixed transactional update on GCE (bsc#1211398).
- Use HTTPS in rmt-client-setup-res (bsc#1209825).
- Various build fixes (bsc#1207670, bsc#1203171, bsc#1206593,
  bsc#1202053).
document_notes.title: Details

notes.text: A DoS vulnerability exists in Rack <v3.0.4.2, <v2.2.6.3, <v2.1.4.3 and <v2.0.9.3 within in the Multipart MIME parsing code in which could allow an attacker to craft requests that can be abuse to cause multipart parsing to take longer than expected.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description
